content: lion brand pattern # 20124ad skill level intermediate level 3 150-098 fishermen s wool yarn natural 4 balls crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge one block = 8 x 10 in 20 x 23 cm special stitches cluster cluster single_crochet-tbl stitch single_crochet/double_crochet stitch make 10 blocks each of 3 different patterns 30 blocks total sew blocks together following diagram for placement work crochet border to finish
